name: Consciousness - The Mirror Gates - Touch The Stars
name_original: Consciousness - The Mirror Gates - Touch The Stars
description:
Consciousness The Mirror Gate is a role playing game developed by kinstothegame on RPG MAKER MZ software for Windows.  The game was design to challenge the player by the choices that you make in the game. What I tried to do is made the software more intelligent where it communicates with you by the way you react towards it.  This piece is a DEMO free for everyone who likes RPG games to play.
The event "RPG Maker MZ Touch The Stars Game Jam " made this project happen.

STORY : The boy in his mind is confused as he open a door which leads to a mirror.  It is possible that the mirror is the portal of dreams. Something bizarre happen as he touch the mirror his soul seems to transcend into another realm. This is where his new life begins.

Focus mostly on story telling.  

Total play time varies from 30 minutes to an hour.

Thank you for playing.
